I still enjoy my meat but have become a responsible adult.
I've never been afraid to try new things, but my first time competing in a beauty pageant was definitely the most difficult thing I've ever done.
i love lasagna like i m garfield.
I do yoga every morning to keep my body healthy and flexible, but I'm not able to go to high altitudes because of my condition.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

content.text: Hi there! My name is participant_1. I am a recovering addict, and I am really passionate about helping others. I would love to have lunch with my sponsor, who has helped me so much on my journey of recovery.

Hi participant_2, my name is participant_2. I am a responsible adult who enjoys lasagna and yoga. I also procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets. What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love to create websites, and I am also really passionate about education. I have a degree in American literature and education, and I do my best to support my family and be there for them.

That's great! I have never been afraid to try new things, but my first time competing in a beauty pageant was definitely the most difficult thing I've ever done. I also love to cook, and I'm a big fan of meat.

I'm glad you're so adventurous! I've never competed in a beauty pageant, but I can imagine it would be a lot of pressure. I'm also a big fan of meat, but I've been trying to cut back on my consumption because of my health.
That's a good idea. I have a condition that prevents me from going to high altitudes, so I have to be careful about what I eat.
That sounds like it can be challenging, but I'm sure you're doing a great job of managing it.
It sounds like we have a lot in common. I'd love to get to know you better. Would you be interested in having lunch sometime?
Sure! That would be great. I'm free this weekend.
Perfect! I'll send you a message with some details
